Reference

Package information

tbgeneratr

tbgeneratr: A package for generating TB data.

Aggregating functions

Combine multiple functions to streamline workflow

adm_generator()

Admission TB variable generator

adm_lab_generator()

Admission and lab merged TB generator

Admission data functions

Functions used only for admission data sets

age_generator()

Calculate age from two dates

bmi_generator()

Calculate BMI from height and weight

finalise_outcome()

Finalise TB treatment outcome

start_splittr()

Split start treatment variable into year/month/day

Admission and Laboratory data functions

Functions requiring both admission and laboratory data sets

baseliner()

Calculate baseline culture or smear status

converter()

Culture/smear conversion calculator

drug_baseliner()

Baseline drug DST

dst_baseliner()

Baseline DST calculator

Admission and Change data functions

Functions requiring both admission and change data sets

drug_timer()

Drug duration calculator
